newsitem.title: UK: LIFFE coffee above lows, cocoa flat AM.
newsitem.headline: LIFFE coffee above lows, cocoa flat AM.

text.p: COFFEE - Quietly lower but off early floor after meeting pre-opening calls of $50-$70 down. Sept off $36 at $1,635 at 0944 GMT.
COCOA - A touch lower after gapping a couple of stg up at the open. Early activity thin and centred on Sept/Dec spread. Sept off one stg at 1,023.
SUGAR - Barely traded and prices drift lower. Oct down $2.80 at $324.90.
